# R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>. [hyperlink](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com)

When you click the **Knit** button a *document* will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.

## Tabbed Plots {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset.pills}


### Plot 1 {-}

```{r plot1, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

### Plot 2 {-}

```{r hist1, echo=FALSE}
hist(pressure$pressure)
```
